answers.answer: Make sure your doctor knows you are allergic to the dye, that is a rather common problem.Please try to remain calm, remember this is not something they are not used to seeing and preforming, I am sure you are in very good hands.Please keep us updated and good luck!

question: I am scheduled for and angiogram Friday. I am terrified. Went to an electrophysialogist for supra ventricular tachycardia. Had a stress test about 6months ago and either artifact or a problem. I am a 64 year old female with diabetes and hypertension. The electrophysialogist called my cardiologist and told him he thought I had a heart blockage rather then an electrical. He thought the blockage might be causing the electrical problems. I am terrified because I am allergic to IVP dye!!
title: Cardiac CT vs Angiogram
